last_episode_to_air.name: Special Defects
last_episode_to_air.overview: Timon & Pumbaa ask for Rafiki's help to fix the problems both hate about each other which keeps going horribly awry.

name: Timon & Pumbaa
overview: Set after the events of the "The Lion King," follow Timon and Pumbaa as they go on misadventures in the jungle, as well as across the globe in various.

episodes.name: Boara Boara
episodes.overview: On a South Seas Island, Timon and Pumbaa run into some natives who make Pumbaa their god-king.

episodes.name: Saskatchewan Catch
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa help a female flying squirrel snare the love of her life, in return for her fetching some tree beetles for them to eat.

episodes.name: Kenya Be My Friend?
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa break up after an argument, and each finds a new bestest best friend.

episodes.name: Rafiki Fables: Good Mousekeeping
episodes.overview: Rafiki grants a bullied mouse his wish to have the abilities to fly like a bird, swim like a fish, and be as tall as a giraffe.

episodes.name: Never Everglades
episodes.overview: Pumbaa thinks that he's laid an egg. So he and a reluctant Timon raise the ""ugly chicken"" that hatches from it..

episodes.name: The Laughing Hyenas: Cooked Goose
episodes.overview: The Cheetahs try to get rid of the Hyenas by sending them on various wild goose chases.

episodes.name: How to Beat the High Costa Rica
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa clash with Criminal Quint over a suitcase containing $1,290,000.00 in stolen money.

episodes.name: Swiss Missed
episodes.overview: Timon persuades the timekeeper of the local clocktower to take a break from his work and live a Hakuna-Matata lifestyle.

episodes.name: Uganda Be an Elephant
episodes.overview: Timon makes Pumbaa want to be popular like Ned the Elephant. So Pumbaa tries to become an elephant with Timon's help.

episodes.name: To Kilimanjaro Bird
episodes.overview: Angry about Timon stealing her son's food, a mother eagle forces Timon and Pumbaa to babysit her Baby Earl, who keeps trying to fly even though he doesn't know how.

episodes.name: French Fried
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to save their new best friend Speedy the Snail from French chef Culinary Quint.

episodes.name: The Laughing Hyenas: Big Top Breakfast
episodes.overview: The hyenas try to catch and eat a circus monkey who fell out of a plane.

episodes.name: The Pain in Spain
episodes.overview: Carlos and Consuelo Quint mistake Pumbaa for a bull and capture him to replace the aging El Toro as their bullfighting star. But El Toro won't go away without a fight.

episodes.name: Frantic Atlantic
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa befriend accident prone penguin Irwin to get his ocean liner tickets.

episodes.name: Tanzania Zany
episodes.overview: Timon's former bestest best friend Fred pays a visit, pulling practical jokes and coming between the pair of friends.

episodes.name: Guatemala Malarkey
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa discover the Lost Forgotten Abandoned Temple Shrine of the Sacred Glorious Golden Fruit Fly. So Timon looks for the Prized, Jewel-Encrusted, and Very Worth a Lot of Money, Glorious Golden Fruit Fly. But a giant mummy beetle menaces the duo.

episodes.name: Back Out in the Outback
episodes.overview: In Australia, Timon mistakes a land crab for a giant bug and tries several times to get him. But the crab proves too clever for Timon.

episodes.name: Gabon With the Wind
episodes.overview: To save himself from the Cheetahs, Timon promises to trap Pumbaa for them.

episodes.name: Timon's Time Togo
episodes.overview: Timon dies after eating a poisonous bug. But an angel agrees to send him back to Earth, so that he can perform one good deed to be permitted to enter Heaven.

episodes.name: The Law of the Jungle
episodes.overview: Timon uses the Forbidden Stick to scratch his back, incurring the wrath of Judge Rhino and the Vulture Police who make up laws and punishments to persecute Timon.

episodes.name: Be More Pacific
episodes.overview: Timon instructs Pumbaa on what to wish for when Pumbaa rescues a magic wishing whale. But the wishes keep getting misinterpreted.

episodes.name: Going Uruguay
episodes.overview: Timon helps a lost Termite King find his colony, intending to eat all the termites when they get there.

episodes.name: Yosemite Remedy
episodes.overview: Timon seeks revenge against the thief who stole his and Pumbaa's valuables when the Vulture Police can't arrest him.

episodes.name: Rafiki Fables: The Sky Is Calling
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa argue over what to do with a chunk of the Big Bluish Black Thing that's crashed right between them. Rafiki tells them that therefore the chunk is a sign that they can no longer have anything to do with each other.

episodes.name: Mozam-Beaked
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to catch a woodpecker who's pecking at their favorite tree.

episodes.name: Ocean Commotion
episodes.overview: While on a cruise ship, Timon and Pumbaa try to rescue Speedy from a married couple who want to make an earring out of Speedy's shell.

episodes.name: Brazil Nuts
episodes.overview: In the Amazon, Timon and Pumbaa discover an all-you-can-eat bug buffet run by two snakes. But it's actually a trap!

episodes.name: South Sea Sick
episodes.overview: Pumbaa gets sick so Timon jumps at the opportunity to cure his bestest best friend.

episodes.name: Yukon Con
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa break up over ownership of any gold they find on their Yukon claim, just when Pumbaa stikes it rich. Cusco Quint schemes to use the break-up to get the gold for himself.

episodes.name: Doubt of Africa
episodes.overview: Pumbaa and a reluctant Timon help out a widowed tigress learn how to catch her own prey.

episodes.name: Russia Hour
episodes.overview: Pumbaa and Timon visit Pumbaa's Uncle Boaris, the greatest ballet dancer in all of Russia. But Timon accidentally causes Boaris to get seriously hurt just before his farewell performance..

episodes.name: You Ghana Join the Club
episodes.overview: A group of ground squirrels named Ted fence off Timon and Pumbaa's favorite spot in the jungle for their own exclusionary club, and make the duo pester an unfriendly lion in order to get back in

episodes.name: Rocky Mountain Lie
episodes.overview: Timon thinks he's eaten a bug that became Pumbaa's new friend, and so lies about what might've happened to him.

episodes.name: Amazon Quiver
episodes.overview: A panther traps Timon and Pumbaa in the trunk of a tree, but for how long?

episodes.name: Madagascar About You
episodes.overview: Timon helps Pumbaa try to find a way out of an arranged marriage.

episodes.name: Truth or Zaire
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa pretend to be baby gorillas so that a female gorilla will protect them from Congo Quint.

episodes.name: Mojave Desserted
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa save the life of an obnoxious rabbit, who then tries to repay them by waiting on them hand and foot forever.

episodes.name: Rafiki Fables: Beauty and the Wildebeest
episodes.overview: Rafiki helps an ugly wildebeest improve his looks and manners so that he can romance a gazelle that he has a crush for.

episodes.name: Don't Break the China
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa help a lost kid panda find his parents, expecting a big reward when they return him home.

episodes.name: The Laughing Hyenas: Can't Take A Yolk
episodes.overview: When morning comes, Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed try to steal an ostrich egg away from its mother, but keep failing until they disguised themselves as birds.  Song: Stand By Me: Timon sings "Stand By Me" along with three frogs while various unfortunate events keep happening to Pumbaa (Timon doesn't notice this).

episodes.name: Unlucky in Lesotho
episodes.overview: Timon gets hit by a streak of bad luck just on the day he has to protect the Lucky Jar to get into Ned's Good Luck Club.

episodes.name: Rafiki Fables: Rafiki's Apprentice
episodes.overview: Rafiki's nephew uses the Magic Stick to help him gather gourds for his uncle. But he gets in over his head

episodes.name: Mombasa-In-Law
episodes.overview: When his mother pays a visit, Timon has to pretend that he's a responsible contributing member of the meerkat society, and Pumbaa has to pretend that he's Timon's wife.

episodes.name: The Laughing Hyenas: TV Dinner
episodes.overview: The hyenas try to get on Martin Pardon's "Kingdom of the Creatures" show to get at the big meals Pardon feeds his animal stars.

episodes.name: Manhattan Mishap
episodes.overview: On their way to New York, Timon and Pumbaa are thrown out of the plane and land on a desert island whose only resident is a very hungry castaway.

episodes.name: Paraguay Parable
episodes.overview: An anteater tricks Timon and Pumbaa into having a competition to see who can catch the most bugs on one's own.

episodes.name: Let's Serengeti out of Here
episodes.overview: Overzealous biologist Mr. Happy holds Timon and Pumbaa against their will in his animal sanctuary in order to "protect" them.

episodes.name: Congo on Like This
episodes.overview: A tarsier warns Timon and Pumbaa of a predator prowling about, and they suspect that Simba might be the predator.

episodes.name: Okay Bayou?
episodes.overview: A possum guides Timon and Pumbaa through the Louisiana Bayou to reach the great Boudreaux.

episodes.name: Shake Your Djibouti
episodes.overview: Concerned about a monster's escape from Dr. Happy's lab, Timon drills Simba so that he'll be able to protect him and Pumbaa.

episodes.name: Palm Beached
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa want to "nap" by the rooftop swimming pool of a posh hotel. But Concierge Quint keeps throwing them out.

episodes.name: Jamaica Mistake?
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa chase a "moth" into the spooky mansion of Mr. Pirebat..

episodes.name: Oregon Astray
episodes.overview: Boss Beaver converts Pumbaa to his "Makuta Hamaka" (Work real hard) philosophy and convinces Pumbaa to take jobs in his dam-building operation for himself and Timon, with surprising results.

episodes.name: New Guinea Pig
episodes.overview: Pumbaa considers getting rid of his tusks by trading them to the natives.

episodes.name: Klondike Con
episodes.overview: Courteous Quint teams up with Timon and Pumbaa to find gold in the Artic. But Timon obstinately refuses to trust him.

episodes.name: Isle Find Out
episodes.overview: Timon becomes obsessed with finding out what a group of flamingos standing around in a sandbar might be planning.

episodes.name: Wide Awake in Wonderland
episodes.overview: Pumbaa makes Timon read bedtime stories from his "Little Book of Warthog Fairy Tales", which all portray warthogs in a good light but meerkats in a bad light.

episodes.name: Zazu's Off-by-One Day
episodes.overview: When Zazu is told by the Jungle Inspector that he left one animal out in his counting, he ends up fired and Gopher takes his place. Can Zazu find the animal that he forgot to count?

episodes.name: Africa-Dabra!
episodes.overview: The Rabbit teams up with Timon to form a magic act for a talent competition, but also tricks Timon and Pumbaa into breaking up.

episodes.name: I Don't Bolivia
episodes.overview: Master criminal/liar Toucan Dan keeps tricking Timon into freeing him from his prison.

episodes.name: Catch Me If You Kenya
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to get past a guard tiger to get at the Peter-Lorre husband's butterfly collection.

episodes.name: Scent of the South
episodes.overview: Pumbaa turns to a skunk's expert help when he thinks he can't be bestest best friends with Timon anymore because of his smell. But Timon thinks Pumbaa's left him for the skunk because of her smell.

episodes.name: Forbidden Pumbaa
episodes.overview: Timon tries to save Pumbaa from an alien robot sent to abduct one warthog.

episodes.name: Washington Applesauce
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa agree to save an apple-growing town from an ever-growing worm.

episodes.name: I Think I Canada
episodes.overview: A wolverine "persuades" Timon and Pumbaa to join in his "Survival of the Fittest" fitness program.

episodes.name: Zazu's Off Day Off
episodes.overview: Zazu has to work on his day off when an elephant blocks up the river, depriving the animals of their water supply.

episodes.name: Timon on the Range
episodes.overview: In the old west, an outlaw gang mistakes Pumbaa for their leader.

episodes.name: The Man from J.U.N.G.L.E.
episodes.overview: Timon's plan to masquerade as Super Duper Hero X in order to make money off of personal appearances goes awry when Hero X's arch-enemy, Chromosone Quint, kidnaps him.

episodes.name: Maine-iacs
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa stumble upon Boss Beaver's lumber mill, where Boss Beaver emphasizes "Safety First" above all else.

episodes.name: Fiji-Fi-Fo-Fum
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa have nothing for their Bestest Best Friend Day feast. So Pumbaa sells their cow for three Magic Bees.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Timon
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to get past a guard tiger to get at the Peter-Lorre husband's butterfly collection.

episodes.name: Home Is Where the Hog Is
episodes.overview: Pumbaa turns to a skunk's expert help when he thinks he can't be bestest best friends with Timon anymore because of his smell. But Timon thinks Pumbaa's left him for the skunk because of her smell.

episodes.name: Beethoven's Whiff
episodes.overview: Timon tries to conduct Beethoven's Fifth Symphony, but Pumbaa keeps messing things up.

episodes.name: Bumble in the Jungle
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to catch a bumblebee in a short that's set to music and has no dialogue.

episodes.name: Mind Over Matterhorn
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to sneak past the billy goat guard of the border to France when they don't have the right papers to get through.

episodes.name: Isle of Manhood
episodes.overview: Timon finally tries to pass the Test of Manhood, at the urgings of Pumbaa, who also serves as his merit badge judge.

episodes.name: Puttin' on the Brits
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to save a cute little fox from a persistant foxhound.

episodes.name: Beetle Romania
episodes.overview: For trying to eat her, a gypsy moth puts a curse on Timon that doesn't take effect until the next morning.

episodes.name: Rumble in the Jungle
episodes.overview: Rafiki tries to keep angry Timon and Pumbaa from fighting with each other.

episodes.name: Animal Barn
episodes.overview: Pumbaa competes against a champion domestic pig in a contest for the right to be called "Mr. Pig".

episodes.name: Roach Hotel
episodes.overview: The manager of the Spotless Arms Hotel hires Timon and Pumbaa to catch two troublesome cockroaches.

episodes.name: Shopping Mauled
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa hide in various stores at the Hakuna Matata MegaMall trying to avoid Irwin.

episodes.name: Library Brouhaha
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to catch a bookworm in the Don B. Loud Library without being too loud.

episodes.name: Monster Massachusetts
episodes.overview: A mad scientist wants to use Timon and Pumbaa in his morphing experiments.

episodes.name: Handle With Caribbean
episodes.overview: Timon makes himself captain of a group of really dumb pirates in an effort to get to Nashville.

episodes.name: Alcatraz Mataz
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to break out of prison and catch Toucan Dan, who's framed them for stealing a traincar of beak polish.

episodes.name: Oahu Wahoo
episodes.overview: Timon becomes the devoted disciple of a stone idol that he insists is giving him orders.

episodes.name: Beast of Eden
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa agree to help a monster retrieve his gold tooth from the natives.

episodes.name: Sense and Senegambia
episodes.overview: Timon thinks that Pumbaa can't catch bugs because something's wrong with his senses, and so buys expensive aides for Pumbaa.

episodes.name: Rome Alone
episodes.overview: In the Roman Colliseum, the emperor Colliseum Quintius tries to force Simba to eat Timon and Pumbaa.

episodes.name: Amusement Bark
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa visit Boss Beaver's Log Land, but a rotten kid keeps breaking things and getting Timon blamed for it.

episodes.name: Super Hog-o
episodes.overview: After an inspiration from a Lightning Lard comic, Pumbaa becomes a superhero.

episodes.name: Don't Have the Vegas Idea
episodes.overview: To get money for lobsters (which is mistakened for bugs), Timon and Pumbaa get jobs in an act involving White Lions.

episodes.name: Ivy Beleagured
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa go to college, but the students like Pumbaa more.

episodes.name: Broadway Bound and Gagged
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa compete against each other to make the best broadway play.

episodes.name: No-Good Samaritan
episodes.overview: A leopard king's daughter mistakens Timon and Pumbaa as the ones who saved her from Ed the Hyena. This causes her father to appoint them as her bodyguards.

episodes.name: Living in De Nile
episodes.overview: After Timon eats a Scarab Beetle, Tutun Pharaoh throws Timon and Pumbaa in the pyramid for all eternity.

episodes.name: Miss Perfect
episodes.overview: Pumbaa mistakenly wins a beauty pageant when a fly gets trapped a machine and begins to neglect Timon.

episodes.name: Hakuna Matata U.
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa start a university teaching others about Hakuna Matata. Only a sloth and a smart owl show up to their disbelief.

episodes.name: One Tough Bug
episodes.overview: Timon targets a strong bug to eat while Pumbaa acts like a hippie to prevent Timon from catching it.

episodes.name: Pirates of Pumbzance
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa get jobs as pirates working for Captain Bloodbeard, but it's not as Pumbaa hoped for.

episodes.name: Pig-malion
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa enroll in a hedgehog professor's university where Pumbaa is smart and Timon procrastinates.

episodes.name: Why No Rhino
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa run a safari to get money from a rich couple, even if it's finding the rare Blue Rhino.

episodes.name: War Hogs
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa join a warthog army only to find out that a war is starting.

episodes.name: The Big No Sleep
episodes.overview: Pumbaa keeps Timon up all night to see the Porkeswanees, but them not sleeping attracts the Sandman.

episodes.name: Common Scents
episodes.overview: Pumbaa starts a business selling perfume.

episodes.name: Mister Twister
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa need a job in order to raise the membership fee for the "Bug Of The Month" club. When all Pumbaa's ideas go wrong, Timon suggests becoming tornado watchers, which falls to pieces when a real twister comes along.

episodes.name: Don't Be Elfish
episodes.overview: Timon wants a video game for Christmas. So he and Pumbaa get jobs at the mall, Pumbaa being Santa and Timon being an elf. Timon makes kids meet his every need or they won't get to talk to Santa. Then one of Santa's elves shows up and tells Timon he's on the naughty list. So Timon desperately tries to get on the nice list to get his video game.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Traction
episodes.overview: Pumbaa helps Timon become a movie star to impress a female meerkat.

episodes.name: Lemonade Stand Off
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa decide to start a lemonade stand. Then decide to go their separate ways and each start their own stand. And spend all of their time trying to keep the other from sabotashing their stand. It turns out their Lemonade is terrible.

episodes.name: Big Jungle Game
episodes.overview: Pumbaa joins an olympic jungle game to live out his dream.

episodes.name: It Runs Good
episodes.overview: Working as car salesman, Timon and Pumbaa sell a car to Mr. Bear and end up working it to keep him happy.

episodes.name: Hot Air Buffoons
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa stumble onto a balloon and end up in a race around the world.

episodes.name: So Sumo Me
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa train to be sumo wrestlers.

episodes.name: Now Museum, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa visit a museum where a security guard is protecting a bug exhibit from bug eaters.

episodes.name: Wishy Washy
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa find a genie's lamp and soon they wish for a million more wishes.

episodes.name: Ice Escapades
episodes.overview: Pumbaa trains Timon to be an ice skater.

episodes.name: Steel Hog
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa accidentally bump into a group of Smell's Angels. Rather than killing Pumbaa for beating the leader of the gang in a fight, they ask him to join. While Pumbaa, with the nickname "Beef," is having tons of fun, Timon, with the nickname "Toothpick," misses the old days of Hakuna Matata.

episodes.name: Dealer's Choice Cut
episodes.overview: Timon plays a game of poker with some of the jungle animals. When Pumbaa is put up for bid against a man from a meat producing business who wins, Timon must rescue Pumbaa from being made into someone's lunch.

episodes.name: Timon in Love
episodes.overview: Timon falls in love with himself after looking at his reflection upon being hit by Cupid's arrow.

episodes.name: Kahuna Potato
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa ask Rafiki to teach them kung fu when a buff meerkat and warthog named Pimon and Tumbaa takes their grub bag.

episodes.name: Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: Pumbaa and Timon create a salsa made of bugs. Everyone (including humans) likes the salsa, but will Pumbaa tell all the people the secret recipe?

episodes.name: Going Over-Boar'd
episodes.overview: Pumbaa and Timon go on a cruise ship, but after a run-in with the captain they find themselves at the wheel of the boat, fighting over who's going to be captain. Their ship nows goes through Los Angeles, is attacked by an octopus and it lands in a totally different bed of water.

episodes.name: Luck Be a Meerkat
episodes.overview: Timon finds Pumbaa's lucky marble.

episodes.name: Just When You'd Thought You'd Cuisine It All
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to learn to cook.

episodes.name: Boo Hoo Bouquet
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa try to give a flower to a man. But the man hates flowers.

episodes.name: Timon Alone
episodes.overview: Timon wants to be alone... he later changes his mind.

episodes.name: Visiting Pig-nitaries
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa are visiting in Etiquettica, when they run in to an assistant to the Empress who mistakes them for visiting dignitaries. Timon talks Pumbaa in to going along with it. Pumbaa eats bugs in front of the assistant, ruins Etiquettica's Constitution by using it as a tissue to blow his nose, then ruins a painting of Etiquettica's first Emperor, burps in the Empress's face, and ruins a fancy dinner. Timon covers up for it by saying, "A custom in our country." They get thrown out as soon as Timon admitts they're not fancy-schmancy dignitaries.

episodes.name: The Truth About Kats and Hogs
episodes.overview: A Animal Behavioral Scientist, Jean Farrel, is watching Pumbaa (whom she calls Melvin) for study, although he doesn't like it very much. Soon she shows Pumbaa some bugs, and he doesn't care anymore. Timon (Billy Bob) has now caught Jean's attention. She can not decide which animal to study, the meerkat or the warthog. Timon and Pumbaa try to help her decide with every talent they have, which makes her go crazy. She's so crazy, that some male Naturalists think she's a Wild Woman of the Jungle and take her away.

episodes.name: Guru Some
episodes.overview: Pumbaa's sayings causes the jungle's animals to get advice from him.

episodes.name: Jailhouse Shock
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa end up in jail for eating June Bugs in July. They end up being cell mates with Little Jimmy and his new friend Mr. Bear.

episodes.name: Nearly Departed
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa get stung by Red-Skeetled Orpion (a sub-species to the scorpion) whose poison is fatal in 24 hours and do various stuff they haven't done before they expire.

episodes.name: Early Bird Watchers
episodes.overview: Timon tries to compete with the Early Bird into getting a worm in various ways to wake up before it.

episodes.name: The Spy's the Limit
episodes.overview: After injuring a secret agent, Timon and Pumbaa use his stuff in order to stop Count Down from destroying the sun.

episodes.name: Ready, Aim, Fire
episodes.overview: Somewhere in the north, Timon and Pumbaa stumble upon a campfire. However, they end up in between extinguishing the fire to prevent getting in trouble with Smolder the Bear and relighting the fire for a French-like Quint.

episodes.name: Timoncchio
episodes.overview: Rafiki casts a spell on Timon in which whenever Timon tells a fib, his tail grows longer.

episodes.name: Ghost Boosters
episodes.overview: After Timon sees an ad in the newspaper, he and Pumbaa deside to go hunt ghosts in a house.

episodes.name: Stay Way from My Honey!
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa fall in love with a lady named Leslie Lambeau, but run into conflict with Mr. Bear who also wants her love.

episodes.name: Sitting Pretty Awful
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa babysit triplet.

episodes.name: Escape From Newark
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa are trapped in a 5 stars pet shop. Now they want to escape from their "golden cage".

episodes.name: Truth Be Told
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumba are the winners of "The Best Friend in the jungle". But Rafiki have a little surprise for our two friends.

episodes.name: Throw Your Hog in the Ring
episodes.overview: Pumba uses his mouth odour as an effective weapon in Wrestling.

episodes.name: Slalom Problem
episodes.overview: imon and Pumbaa pretend to be skiing instructors in order to make money for a restaurant. Their first client is Smolder the Bear.

episodes.name: Circus Jerks
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa are in a circus, making an angry clown jealous of them.

episodes.name: Nest Best Thing
episodes.overview: Pumbaa builds a house for Little Jimmy.

episodes.name: Hot Enough For Ya?
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa compete against each other in making the hottest chili.

episodes.name: Werehog of London
episodes.overview: Timon suspects Pumbaa of being a werehog after being warned by a creepy male fortune teller.

episodes.name: Bigfoot, Littlebrain
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa meet bigfoot.

episodes.name: Astro-Nots
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa become astronauts.

episodes.name: You May Have Already Won 6 Million Bakra
episodes.overview: Pumbaa becomes a millionaire through a lottery ticket while Timon remains poor.

episodes.name: My Meteor, My Friend
episodes.overview: Pumbaa becomes friends with a down meteor which makes Timon jealous and cause him to find a new friend.

episodes.name: Jungle Slickers
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa go to Kensas.

episodes.name: Don't Wake the Neighbear
episodes.overview: Timon invites his friends for a party, but very quietly.

episodes.name: Space Ham
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa ran to the alien gladiators.

episodes.name: You Bet Your Tukhus
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa are in a game show called "Question For a Trophe"...

episodes.name: Robin Hood-Winked
episodes.overview: Timon becomes Robin Hood to reclaim his gold from Claim-Jumper Quint.

episodes.name: Senergeti Western
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa become sheriffs of a western town when outlaws invade.

episodes.name: Whiff
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa try to hit a golf ball.

episodes.name: To Be Bee Or Not To Be Bee
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa get caught by bees.

episodes.name: The Running Of The Bullies
episodes.overview: While in Spain, Timon agitates El Toro during the Running of the Bulls.

episodes.name: Special Defects
episodes.overview: Timon & Pumbaa ask for Rafiki's help to fix the problems both hate about each other which keeps going horribly awry.

episodes.name: All Pets Are Off
episodes.overview: While in New York City, Timon and Pumbaa become pets to a rich kid in order to eat some cockroaches. However, it does not work out as they hoped and the two try to go outside to eat the cockroaches they see in the window.

episodes.name: Boary Glory Days
episodes.overview: To prevent Pumbaa from bothering him in his bug hunt, Timon lies to him saying that his current age is considered to be old age. He then feels guilty and tries to make Pumbaa feel young again by playing games, such as coconut football and predator tag with Cheetata and Cheetato.

episodes.name: Two for the Zoo
episodes.overview: When trying to be captured by Quint for his zoo, Timon and Pumbaa unwittingly help him capture an Eastern green mamba snake, an East African lion, a black rhinoceros, a mountain gorilla, and a White-backed vulture.

episodes.name: The Swine in the Stone
episodes.overview: While a knight version of Quint is at lunch, Timon and Pumbaa have to get a sword out of a stone for him before a dragon attacks.

episodes.name: He's A Bad, Bad, Bad Sport
episodes.overview: Timon becomes a bad sport when Pumbaa repeatedly wins at every game they compete in.

episodes.name: Dapper Duck Burgers
episodes.overview: Timon and Pumbaa are working at a fast food restaurant called Dapper Duck Burgers. When Smolder confronts them for getting his order wrong, the duo frantically try to correct their mistake to avoid suffering his wrath.

episodes.name: Mook Island
episodes.overview: Because of Timon's rudeness, he and Pumbaa get kicked off a cruise ship, and they sail to a deserted island. There they are greeted by a mad scientist who wants to clone Timon.

episodes.name: Cliphangers
episodes.overview: After trying to get a worm on the Cliffs of Moher, Timon & Pumbaa fall down, nearly plummeting to death, and see their lives' moments flash before their eyes. However, after Pumbaa pulls out an umbrella, the two safely land, and try to eat the worm from before.
